page.title: 08CHILDREN'S HOBBIES
page.content: We did a survey in school on hobbies to find out what children do in their spare time. We made a list of 29 different hobbies.Sport was the most popular hobbie, it includes:running, swimming, ballgames,horseriding,fishing and BMX cycle riding.Some children like to collect things like postcards,stamps shells.there are lots shells such as razor,cockle or pelicans feet.Other things that children collected were things like rubbers,toys,pens, badges and jewellry.Other less popular hobbies included,cooking,drawing, nature study magic and music.Most boys chose football as their favourite hobby. Running was also popular together with other ball games such as netball and basketball.Horseriding was very popular with the girls and the old boys hobby of trainspotting was in the list. JOANNE,JENNY,NICOLA, aged 10
